key_mistakes.reason: Failed to challenge the center and develop pieces effectively.
Opened the position too early without sufficient development.
Allowed White to gain a significant advantage by ignoring a critical pawn capture.
Captured with the wrong piece, missing development opportunities.

recommendations: Focus on controlling the center with pawns and pieces in the opening.
Develop pieces towards the center efficiently.
Avoid creating weaknesses in pawn structure without compensation.
Consider the consequences of pawn moves on piece activity and structure.
